question: "Ninja Militia" was the militant group of which African nation?
explanation: Ninja Militias was the militant group of the Republic of Congo. They were responsible for the numerous clashes and wars of the Republic of Congo during 1990s and 2000s. They were the allies of the 1993-1994 Republic of Congo Civil War; 1997-1999 Republic of Congo Civil War and 2016-2017 Pool War. It was founded b Bernard Kolelas and later headed by Frederic Bintsangou. As per three present status, they are in a ceasefire agreement with the Republic of Congo government and hand over their arms to the government.
